title: About Page

keyPoints.title: BWA Electrical
keyPoints.description: BWA Electrical are fully certified NICEIC approved contractors based in Surrey. We are a family run business with a reputation for high quality work and customer service. Our prices are competitive and we guarantee quality workmanship. Ben Askew heads a team of fully qualified and experienced electricians. BWA electrical is fully insured and has 10+ years experience.

extra:
**Our Guarantee**

Here at BWA Electrical we are committed to providing our customers a service they can trust, Our customers safety is a priority. We have a very experienced and professional team with excellent customer service.

We commit to providing competitive pricing with out "Price beat guarantee"

We'll keep you updated and provide options if things don't go to plan, you can have confidence in how quickly we will respond to any issues that may occur.
